titleStmt.title: A trve copie of the disputation held betweene Master Walker and a Iesuite in the house of one Thomas Bates in Bishops Court in the Old Baily concerning the ecclesiasticall function
titleStmt.author: Walker, Henry, Ironmonger.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Henry Walker by Wing and BM.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
